DOM Elements¶

There are two main class for locating an element on the DOM of your site, described below.

class pieminer.Element(by, selector)¶

Simple struct to store instructions to find an element on a page.

get_attribute(attributeName)¶

Chainable to tell which attribute to extract

class pieminer.MetaData(name)¶

A special type of Element that’s derived from the metadata
